name: Jack and Ruzo
description:
!!!! Warning: To properly experience the game. The player playing as Ruzo mustn't speak!!!

Jack and Ruzo is an asymmetrical Co-op game for two players.

The Game host plays as Jack: A blind man
The Second player plays as Ruzo: Jack's guide dog

Together you must accomplish your tasks of the day (Going to the pharmacy, Buying Groceries, etc...) by walking around the city.

But for a blind man... life isn't as easy. Jack beeing only able to see the contours of objects very close to him... He needs ruzo to be his eyes. However... Ruzo can't speak... and can only bark.

Work together to finish all 6 tasks and make sure not to get hit by a car!

!!!! Warning: To properly experience the game. The player playing as Ruzo mustn't speak!!!

This game is multiplayer!  so unless you are playing on a local network you might have to do some portforwarding (I used Mirror Networking and didn't change de default ports 7777 and 47777)

CONTROLS:

  • Move : ZQSD or Arow Keys
  • Bark : F

GMTK 2021 Gamejam

If you like the concept feel free to let me know so I can make a steam compatible and more polished version!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Launch the game
  • You will end up on a blank looking screen with mirror options
  • Click Start Host or Start Server
  • The second player presses Find Server
  • If the host machine is visible on the local network or across the internet his server ip should appear in the list
  • Click it to join
  • Once both players see the character menu, one player can press start
